column5: Went for a Night Bite crappie hunt last night.  I was the first person on this pond so far and man were those fish ever on...  About 15 bluegill's and 5 crappies in 1 hour, but they were HUGE.  It was a lot of fun all domed up in my new Scout, with a lantern hang'n above my head and endless, drag'rippin, panfish at my toes.   Man I love this early ice.  I wanna head out to Valens on Sunday.  I've never fished there before and was wondering if anyone wants to join??  Cheers!
ice, cant wait to get out on Scugog and me and my friends secret spot.
Great report and pics iceslayer Looked like you had a good time Good job and thanks for sharing Leechman
Great report(again) Iceslayer.  Nice size crappie.   I'd go night fishing too.....cept ts like -35 or -40 at night here....Brrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr   Thanks for sharing.   simon
I always stick around after dark when ever possible for at least a little while. I can't wait to get out. I have plans for 1 weekend on Scugog anyway.  -R-
Yeah, it's in Hamilton.  I dont realy know what we  fish for though..  I know there is panfish, but does anyone know what else is in there??   Thanks.  Jim
Hey Jim have a read about the lake google it and you will see whats there. weekend fishing only
Pike, and their a pretty good size too.  Good luck.  Clarence

OK.  Thanks Clarence.   Thats enough to convince me to go....  Realy hope to meet a few of ya's out there..  So I googled directions, please just confirm this is the right place...  Valens Conservation Area RR-597, Flamborough, OntarioCanada   Cheers!  Jim
Thats the place Jim  I might be there myself sunday
Nice man, i have to saw i never have been night fishing for panfish before. Went bassin at night once and caught a monster rockbass lol.  Thanks for sharing!
